attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.title: Autofocus
attributes.description: Determines if the element should receive document focus on page load

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.title: Disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the button

attributes.name: form
attributes.title: Form ID
attributes.description: The ID of a form to associate the element to

attributes.title: Form processing url
attributes.description: The HTML formaction attribute of the button

attributes.name: formenctype
attributes.title: Form encoding
attributes.description: The HTML formenctype attribute of the button

attributes.name: formmethod
attributes.title: Form submit method
attributes.description: The HTML formmethod attribute of the button

attributes.name: formnovalidate
attributes.title: No form validation
attributes.description: The HTML formnovalidate attribute of the button

attributes.name: formtarget
attributes.title: Form Target
attributes.description: The HTML formtarget attribute of the button

attributes.name: name
attributes.title: Name
attributes.description: The HTML name attribute of the button

attributes.name: type
attributes.title: Type
attributes.description: The HTML type attribute of the button

attributes.name: value
attributes.title: Value
attributes.description: The HTML value attribute of the button

slots.name: start
slots.title: Start slot
slots.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned before the button content

slots.name: end
slots.title: End slot
slots.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned after the button content
